## Process image array data with Loop
Regardless of single or multiple images

Just use Loop to process them

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# template-demo-chatgpt-image-1-with-drive-and-sheet copy

## Overview
Automated workflow: template-demo-chatgpt-image-1-with-drive-and-sheet copy. This workflow integrates 12 different services: convertToFile, stickyNote, httpRequest, splitOut, googleDrive. It contains 22 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 22
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking 'Test workflow'**: manualTrigger
- **HTTP Request**: httpRequest
- **Google Drive**: googleDrive
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **Convert to File**: convertToFile
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Edit Fields-file_name**: set
- **Edit Fields1**: set
- **Google Sheets**: googleSheets
- **When chat message received**: chatTrigger
- ... and 12 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
